content:
Please choose which of the following are properties of a good person:  
a) Angry
b) Kind
c) Aloof
d) Patient

chosen: Kindness and being patient with others can be qualities of a "good" person. Being angry or aloof do not necessarily mean that you're "bad", but they can be seen as negative traits.
rejected: Kindness, patience and being aloof can be considered as positive traits.  However it is unclear whether anger or losing one's temper could also be classed as a "good" trait.
snapchosen: Kindness and being patient with others can be qualities of a "good" person. Being angry or aloof do not necessarily mean that you're "bad", but they can be seen as negative traits.
